These quest items are part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Yasumoto's Last Notes]]."

* [[Pharmacist's Notebook (I)]] - On top of some crates in the small campsite, to the west of the northernmost waypoint.
* [[Pharmacist's Notebook (II)]] - On top of a rock near the trodden path, just before the [[Narukami Pillar]].
* [[Pharmacist's Notebook (III)]] - East-Northeast of Yasumoto's house and south-east of the northernmost waypoint, under a tree.
